message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand your offer of $90, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I can sell the product to you for $102. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $102. It's the lowest I can go. If you're willing to meet me at $102, I'll make the deal.
